articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, Alex Marquardt, Kylie Atwood
articles.title: US allies express alarm at Trump’s plan to let Russia keep most of the land it seized from Ukraine - CNN
articles.description: Some US allies are highly alarmed by the framework the Trump administration is pushing to end the Ukraine war and Europeans are bracing for the outcomes of another round of high-level talks between the US and Russia, multiple diplomatic sources told CNN.
